list.name: Changes
list.comment: Extract `FunctionPositions` to a dedicated class in `magma.node` for improved modularity. Update references in `CodeUtils` and `FunctionHelper`. Adjust workspace XML formatting.

task.summary: Default task

changelist.name: Changes
changelist.comment: Delete everything! This is a hard reset!

task.summary: Fix whitespace inconsistencies in `Compiler` and improve comment formatting for better readability

Add block processing to `Compiler` with scoping rules. Implement `processCodeBlock` and `splitIntoStatements` methods. Extend `CompilerTest` with tests for block handling and variable scope validation.

Add support for mutable variables and reassignment in `Compiler`. Update `VariableInfo` to track mutability and extend `Compiler` with reassignment handling. Enhance `CompilerTest` with test cases for mutable and immutable variables.
Add `IssueDescriptionTest` for verifying behavior of immutable and mutable variables. Update `Checkstyle` to limit methods to 15 lines. Adjust IDE run configurations.

Refactor `CompilerTest` with helper methods for validation and streamline tests for variable declarations and reassignment. Fix whitespace inconsistencies in `Compiler`. Update `Checkstyle` to enforce loop limits in methods.
Remove `Compiler`, `CompileException`, tests, and related files.
Add `Compiler`, `CompileException`, and `CompilerTest` with initial implementation and basic test coverage. Update project configuration files accordingly.
Add pattern matching for `let I32` declarations in `Compiler` and test coverage in `CompilerTest`
Generalize `let` pattern in `Compiler` to support signed and unsigned integer types. Refactor `CompilerTest` with a helper method for cleaner test validation.
Refactor `let` pattern in `Compiler` to avoid inline conditionals and update `Checkstyle` to disallow ternary operator usage.
Update `Checkstyle` configuration to replace `MethodLength` check with nesting depth restrictions and enhance readability constraints
Add support for additional integer types in `Compiler` (`I8`, `I16`, `I64`, `U8`, `U16`, `U32`, `U64`) and extend `CompilerTest` with corresponding test cases.
Refactor `CompilerTest` to consolidate integer type tests using parameterized tests.
Add support for `let <name> = <int>;` syntax in `Compiler` with default type `I32` and corresponding test case in `CompilerTest`.
Add support for `let <name> = <number><suffix>;` syntax in `Compiler` with C type mapping and add corresponding test case in `CompilerTest`.
Add initial `.junie/guidelines.md` with basic build instructions
Refactor `Compiler` patterns for readability, add type mismatch check, and update `CompilerTest` with additional test case.
Refactor `CompilerTest` to replace duplicate assertion logic with helper method, adjust formatting in parameterized tests for consistency.
Refactor `CompilerTest` to replace duplicate assertion logic with helper method, adjust formatting in parameterized tests for consistency.
Add support for `let <name> = <identifier>;` syntax in `Compiler` with type inference and validation. Update `CompilerTest` with corresponding test case.
Add support for `mut` variables and assignment syntax in `Compiler`. Update `CompilerTest` with tests for mutability validation.

Extract statement handling logic from `Compiler` to new `StatementHandlers` class for better modularity. Add support for conditional operator in `let` and assignment syntax. Update `CompilerTest` with additional cases and simplify assertion methods.
Add support for pointer declaration and address-of initializer in `Compiler`. Update `CompilerTest` with corresponding cases. Refactor `handleLetMut` for pattern consolidation.
Add support for `let x : U8..U64` and `let x : I8..I64` syntax in `Compiler`. Update `CompilerTest` with comprehensive test cases covering all integer types.
Add support for suffix-typed integer literals (e.g., `let x = 0U8;`) in `Compiler`. Update `CompilerTest` with corresponding test case. Factor out declaration emission logic.
Add default type handling for untyped integer literals in `Compiler`. Update `CompilerTest` with corresponding test case.
Add support for typed and untyped `Bool` literals in `Compiler`. Update `CompilerTest` with relevant test cases. Extend `checkstyle.xml` with method count rule.

Add support for multiple semicolon-terminated `let` statements in `Compiler`. Update `CompilerTest` with test cases for variable references and multi-statement scenarios. Refactor `Compiler` for modular statement handling.

Add support for mutable `let` declarations and assignments in `Compiler`. Update `CompilerTest` with test cases for mutability and assignment validation. Refactor environment handling to use `VarInfo`.

Refactor `Compiler` by extracting declaration and type handling logic into `DeclarationHelper`, `TypeHelper`, and `ValueResolver`. Update `CompilerTest` with streamlined, consolidated test cases. Simplify and modularize core logic for enhanced maintainability.
Add `IfStatementHelper` for processing `if` statements and integrate with `Compiler`. Update `CompilerTest` with validation cases for `if` statement handling.

Add support for `else` blocks in `Compiler`. Update `CompilerTest` with validation cases for `if-else` statement handling. Refactor `IfStatementHelper` to process `else` blocks and ensure proper syntax validation.

Add `ControlStructureHelper` and `WhileStatementHelper` for processing control flow constructs. Integrate `while` statement support into `Compiler`. Update `CompilerTest` with validation cases for `while` statement handling. Refactor `IfStatementHelper` to use `ControlStructureHelper` for shared logic.
Add `StructHelper` for processing struct declarations. Update `Compiler` to support empty structs and extend `CompilerTest` with validation for struct handling.
Add support for structs with members in `Compiler`. Update `StructHelper` to handle member declarations and type validation. Extend `CompilerTest` with cases for structs with and without members.

Add support for struct initialization in `Compiler`. Update `StructHelper`, `TypeHelper`, and `ValueResolver` to process struct definitions and initializations. Extend `CompilerTest` with validation cases for struct initialization.

Add support for struct field access in `Compiler`. Update `ValueResolver` to handle field access expressions. Extend `StructHelper` and `DeclarationHelper` for type matching. Add tests for field access in `CompilerTest`.
Enforce immutability for struct fields in `Compiler`. Update assignment logic to reject field assignments and add corresponding test case in `CompilerTest`.
Add `FunctionHelper` for processing function declarations. Update `Compiler` to support `fn empty() : Void => {}` syntax and extend `CompilerTest` with a validation case.

Refactor tests into specialized classes. Add `BaseCompilerTest` for shared utilities, `CodeUtils` for brace matching, and new test suites (`ControlFlowTest`, `FunctionTest`, `PrimitiveTypeTest`, `StructTest`). Simplify `CompilerTest`.
Add `StructInitializationHelper` and `StructMemberHelper` for handling struct initialization and member processing. Refactor `StructHelper` to enhance structure parsing and validation logic.

Refactor to modularize struct-related classes. Move `VarInfo`, `Declaration`, and other records to `magma.node`. Replace `ParsedIdentifier` with `StructIdentifier` for enhanced struct handling. Update imports and adapt related helpers.
Refactor to modularize `VarInfo` and `Declaration` into `magma.node`. Extend `FunctionHelper` to support functions with return values and update related declarations and tests.
Extend `FunctionHelper` to map return types. Add tests for functions with explicit return types in `FunctionTest`.

Add `FunctionParts` and `Parameter` classes to modularize function parsing in `FunctionHelper`. Extend `FunctionTest` with additional parameterized function tests and function call validation. Update `Compiler` to handle function calls.
Update `FunctionTest` with tests for multiple functions, parameters, and return types. Adjust workspace settings for improved debugging.
Add support for inner function extraction and compilation. Update `FunctionHelper` to handle nested functions and adjust `FunctionTest` with comprehensive inner function tests.
Refactor `FunctionHelper` to enhance inner function extraction. Introduce `InnerFunctionsResult` record and modularize related utilities into `CodeUtils`.
Extract `FunctionPositions` to a dedicated class in `magma.node` for improved modularity. Update references in `CodeUtils` and `FunctionHelper`. Adjust workspace XML formatting.

MESSAGE.value: Add support for multiple semicolon-terminated `let` statements in `Compiler`. Update `CompilerTest` with test cases for variable references and multi-statement scenarios. Refactor `Compiler` for modular statement handling.

Add support for mutable `let` declarations and assignments in `Compiler`. Update `CompilerTest` with test cases for mutability and assignment validation. Refactor environment handling to use `VarInfo`.
Refactor `Compiler` for improved block and sequence handling. Update `CompilerTest` with new validation cases for scoped blocks. Rewrite sequence compilation logic for enhanced clarity.

Refactor `Compiler` by extracting declaration and type handling logic into `DeclarationHelper`, `TypeHelper`, and `ValueResolver`. Update `CompilerTest` with streamlined, consolidated test cases. Simplify and modularize core logic for enhanced maintainability.
Add `IfStatementHelper` for processing `if` statements and integrate with `Compiler`. Update `CompilerTest` with validation cases for `if` statement handling.

Add support for `else` blocks in `Compiler`. Update `CompilerTest` with validation cases for `if-else` statement handling. Refactor `IfStatementHelper` to process `else` blocks and ensure proper syntax validation.

Add `ControlStructureHelper` and `WhileStatementHelper` for processing control flow constructs. Integrate `while` statement support into `Compiler`. Update `CompilerTest` with validation cases for `while` statement handling. Refactor `IfStatementHelper` to use `
Add `StructHelper` for processing struct declarations. Update `Compiler` to support empty structs and extend `CompilerTest` with validation for struct handling.
Add support for structs with members in `Compiler`. Update `StructHelper` to handle member declarations and type validation. Extend `CompilerTest` with cases for structs with and without members.

Add support for struct initialization in `Compiler`. Update `StructHelper`, `TypeHelper`, and `ValueResolver` to process struct definitions and initializations. Extend `CompilerTest` with validation cases for struct initialization.

Add support for struct field access in `Compiler`. Update `ValueResolver` to handle field access expressions. Extend `StructHelper` and `DeclarationHelper` for type matching. Add tests for field access in `CompilerTest`.
Add `FunctionHelper` for processing function declarations. Update `Compiler` to support `fn empty() : Void => {}` syntax and extend `CompilerTest` with a validation case.

Refactor tests into specialized classes. Add `BaseCompilerTest` for shared utilities, `CodeUtils` for brace matching, and new test suites (`ControlFlowTest`, `FunctionTest`, `PrimitiveTypeTest`, `StructTest`). Simplify `CompilerTest`.

Refactor struct processing logic. Introduce `StructIdentifier`, `StructInitializationHelper`, and `StructMemberHelper` for modular struct handling. Update `StructHelper` to delegate parsing, initialization, and validation tasks to new helpers.
Add `StructInitializationHelper` and `StructMemberHelper` for handling struct initialization and member processing. Refactor `StructHelper` to enhance structure parsing and validation logic.

Refactor to modularize struct-related classes. Move `VarInfo`, `Declaration`, and other records to `magma.node`. Replace `ParsedIdentifier` with `StructIdentifier` for enhanced struct handling. Update imports and adapt related helpers.

Modularize function-related logic: Move `VarInfo` and `Declaration` to `magma.node`; extend `FunctionHelper` for return value support; update `Compiler` and adapt tests to include functions with return types.
Refactor to modularize `VarInfo` and `Declaration` into `magma.node`. Extend `FunctionHelper` to support functions with return values and update related declarations and tests.
Enforce immutability for struct fields in `Compiler`. Update assignment logic to reject field assignments and add corresponding test case in `CompilerTest`.
Extend `FunctionHelper` to map return types. Add tests for functions with explicit return types in `FunctionTest`.

Add `FunctionParts` and `Parameter` classes to modularize function parsing in `FunctionHelper`. Extend `FunctionTest` with additional parameterized function tests and function call validation. Update `Compiler` to handle function calls.
Update `FunctionTest` with tests for multiple functions, parameters, and return types. Adjust workspace settings for improved debugging.
Add support for inner function extraction and compilation. Update `FunctionHelper` to handle nested functions and adjust `FunctionTest` with comprehensive inner function tests.
Refactor `FunctionHelper` to enhance inner function extraction. Introduce `InnerFunctionsResult` record and modularize related utilities into `CodeUtils`.
Extract `FunctionPositions` to a dedicated class in `magma.node` for improved modularity. Update references in `CodeUtils` and `FunctionHelper`. Adjust workspace XML formatting.

option.name: LAST_COMMIT_MESSAGE
option.value: Extract `FunctionPositions` to a dedicated class in `magma.node` for improved modularity. Update references in `CodeUtils` and `FunctionHelper`. Adjust workspace XML formatting.
